title: Keegan Swenson’s Leadville Trail 100 MTB record-smashing power numbers
content:
Swenson rode into the wind alone for over half of the 105-mile race, still breaking the longstanding course record by 15 minutes.

Read the full article at Keegan Swenson’s Leadville Trail 100 MTB record-smashing power numbers on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
